column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Rachael - Thank you for your kind review. I especially appreciate your feedback regarding your feeling rushed by our servers. I will speak to my staff to make sure they take a breath and slow things down a bit. Unfortunately
column2: one of the drawbacks to running a fast-paced
column3: high-volume restaurant is that sometimes it can be difficult to switch gears. Nevertheless
column4: this type of constructive criticism helps us improve our business by highlighting issues that might otherwise go unnoticed. And for that we thank you.
